element.name: fpgPostMessage
element.short: Posts a message to the event queue
element.descr: fpgPostMessage posts a message to the event queue, but doesn't wait for it to compelete. It returns immediately.

element.name: fpgSendMessage
element.short: Sends a message to the event queue
element.descr: fpgSendMessage sends a message to the event queue and waits for it to complete before it returns.
